mean_en: the act or process of joining people, things, parts of a country, etc. together so that they can form a single unit
sentence: The fall of the Berlin Wall brought the unification of East and West Germany.
sentence_trans: 柏林墙的倒塌带来了东德和西德的统一。
word_etyma: uni一个，单一 + fic做 + ation名词后缀 → unification联合
